summary: An unethical merchant moves into town and steals customers from the widowed owner of an established store; the gang steps in to help.
cast: Anna Mae Bilson|Jackie Condon|Mickey Daniels|John Hatton|Ernest Morrison|Buck Black|Peggy Cartwright|Weston Doty|Winston Doty|Henry Hill|George Ward|Helen Gilmore|Wallace Howe|Mark Jones|Fanny Kelly|Charley Young
title: La pandilla
